segments.text: Have you ever thought about your ideal home ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have , actually ; I ’ Ve always wanted to build my dream home myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , it would be spacious and located next to a park , because a nice view is important to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many rooms would it have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d want it to have three bedrooms on a second floor with balconies on each , and one main bedroom on the main floor with an attached en suite . I ’ d also want a large living room and kitchen connected to each other so that there would be one large open space for people to spend time with each other .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many bathrooms would your dream home have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ d have one guest bathroom in the basement , one attached to the main bedroom , and one upstairs , so a total of three .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How would you decorate your house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don ’ t like a lot of clutter , so I wouldn ’ t have lots of things out . I would have a few vases on the mantel piece and some pictures of my family on the walls , but other than that , most things would be kept in closets .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many TVs would your dream home have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think TV is a great waste of time , so I would only have one small TV in the kitchen to watch the news in the morning .
segments.speaker: S2
